summary: Researchers have developed a new technology to measure and manage the carbon footprint of large-scale sports events in real-time, offering organizers actionable insights.
A television personality has undergone a major lifestyle change, embracing a plant-based diet and sharing her journey towards better health on social media.
A new team-based strategy game has been introduced to the esports circuit, promising to shake up the competitive landscape with its unique gameplay mechanics.
A prominent social media influencer has launched a campaign to promote sustainable fashion, donating proceeds from their clothing line to environmental charities.
During a regional track meet, a high school athlete broke the 1500-meter record, previously unchallenged for over two decades, with a time that stunned spectators and competitors alike.
A rivalry between two sports icons has intensified after one athlete publicly questioned the other's recent performance accolades, prompting a series of competitive matchups.
